thread.title: BRIEF-Asure Software Acquires Evolution HCM Customer Portfolio From Wells Fargo Business Payroll Services

title: BRIEF-Asure Software Acquires Evolution HCM Customer Portfolio From Wells Fargo Business Payroll Services

organizations.name: wells fargo business payroll services reuters

text:
April 2, 2018 / 12:34 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Asure Software Acquires Evolution HCM Customer Portfolio From Wells Fargo Business Payroll Services Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Asure Software Inc: 
* ASURE SOFTWARE ACQUIRES EVOLUTION HCM CUSTOMER PORTFOLIO FROM WELLS FARGO BUSINESS PAYROLL SERVICES 
* ‍ACQUISITION OF WELLS FARGO BUSINESS PAYROLL SERVICES’ EVOLUTION HCM CUSTOMER PORTFOLIO​ 
* ‍TRANSACTION IS EFFECTIVE ON APRIL 1, 2018 AND A COMPLETE TRANSITION OF CUSTOMER BASE IS EXPECTED BY JULY 2, 2018​
